mapper.update: UPDATE screening_maoyan SET cinema_id = #{cinemaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, show_date = #{showDate,jdbcType=DATE}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hall = #{hall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, cinema_price = #{cinemaPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, ticket_url = #{ticketUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, cinema_id, movie_id, show_date, start_time, end_time, language, hall, version, sale_price, cinema_price, ticket_url FROM screening_maoyan WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
